Fromers

by Ivan, Fordy, James and Paul

Every Tuesday from 7 ’til 8pm.

A few of your favourite Frome FM presenters will entertain you with their records old and new, and keep you up to date with all the live music offerings in and around the town this week.

Show me more...

Frome FM

A radical fresh approach to radio. A trully shared resource. Open and transparent. Supporting the local community and empowering the collective creativity of its members frome.fm
